EmailTemplate.description: StarTrack Email Template to be used for sending Redirection Notification when resolved by Operations.
EmailTemplate.name: StarTrack Redirection Notification - Customer Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Consignment {!workflow_Email__c.Consignment_Number__c} - StarTrack Case {!workflow_Email__c.Calc_Case_Number__c} has been resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!workflow_Email__c.Calc_Case_Number__c}
Hi {!workflow_Email__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting StarTrack regarding consignment {!workflow_Email__c.Consignment_Number__c}.
Your freight has now been redirected to the requested address. Delivery is expected between 1 - 2 business days.
You can track the progress of your delivery via our website at www.startrack.com.au.
Kind Regards,
StarTrack Customer Service Team
{!workflow_Email__c.Case_Thread_Id__c}
Help & Support | Terms & Conditions | Privacy Policy
